cards.name: Nymeria
cards.text: Intimidate. No attachments. Action: During a challenge in which you control a participating [stark] character, kneel Nymeria and any number of other Direwolf characters to have each of those characters participate in the challenge on your side.

cards.name: Favor of the Old Gods
cards.text: Attached character gains the Old Gods trait. Action: If each character, location, and attachment you control has the [stark] affiliation, kneel Favor of the Old Gods to stand attached character.

cards.name: Hightower Spy
cards.text: Ambush (3). Reaction: After Hightower Spy enters play, choose a character and reveal the top card of your deck. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +X STR. X is the printed cost of the revealed card.

cards.name: Blessed by the Maiden
cards.text: Character you control only. Attached character gains The Seven trait and "No attachments except Blessing."

cards.name: Garrison on the Wall
cards.text: No attachments. Reaction: After Garrison on the Wall is declared as a defender, kneel a non-[thenightswatch] character to stand Garrison on the Wall.

cards.name: Obsidian Arrows
cards.text: Bestow (4). Action: While attached character is attacking, move 1 gold from Obsidian Arrows to a defending character to give that character â€“3 STR until the end of the challenge. (Limit once per challenge.)

cards.name: Selyse Baratheon
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After you marshal Selyse Baratheon, kneel your faction card. Then, kneel each non-Lady character.

cards.name: Dragonstone Castle
cards.text: Reaction: After a phase begins, kneel Dragonstone Castle to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot stand.

cards.name: Ser Balon Swann
cards.text: Renown. Reaction: After a non-[lannister] Knight character enters play under your control, gain 2 gold. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Sweet Cersei
cards.text: During the challenges phase, you may spend gold on Sweet Cersei as if it were in your gold pool. Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, move 1 gold from the treasury to Sweet Cersei.

cards.name: Coastal Reaver
cards.text: Reaction: After Coastal Reaver enters play, choose an opponent. That player chooses a card in his or her hand and places it on top of his or her deck.

cards.name: Support of Harlaw
cards.text: Challenges Action: Kneel a Warship location to have attached character gain (choose one): pillage, renown, or stealth until the end of the phase.

cards.name: Wise Master
cards.text: Bestow (3). Action: Discard 1 gold from Wise Master to return an out-of-faction attachment or event from your discard pile to your hand. (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: Yunkai
cards.text: Bestow (4). Action: During a challenge in which you are the attacking player, kneel Yunkai and discard X gold from it to remove each character with STR X or lower from the challenge (X cannot be 0). Then, if you win the challenge, place 2 gold from the treasury on Yunkai.

cards.name: Planky Town Trader
cards.text: Bestow (5). Interrupt: When Planky Town Trader leaves play, put a non-[martell] character with printed cost X or lower into play from your hand. X is the number of gold on Planky Town Trader. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot leave play.

cards.name: Shandystone
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge as the defending player, kneel Shandystone to choose and stand a character you control.

cards.name: Warrior's Sons
cards.text: No attachments. Reaction: After an opponent plays an event during a challenge in which Warriorâ€™s Sons is participating, move 1 power from that opponentâ€™s faction card to Warriorâ€™s Sons.

cards.name: Seized by the Guard
cards.text: Non-limited location only. Bestow (4). Terminal. Treat attached location as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits). Forced Reaction: After the marshaling phase begins, sacrifice Seized by the Guard unless you discard 1 gold from it.

cards.name: Greensight
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After the draw phase begins, reveal the top card of each player's deck. You may kneel your faction card to discard those cards.

cards.name: The King in the North
cards.text: While a player does not control a King character, he or she cannot trigger abilities on characters, locations, or attachments.
